messages.registrationStart:
Hello @everyone!
It's christmastime :christmas_tree:! That means it's time for a new **gift exchange**!
Registration starts today and ends on the twelfth. Please enter your name before then by using the command `!register`.
Happy exchanging!
messages.registrationEnd:
Hello again @everyone,
**Registration for the christmas exchange is now closed :tada:!** If you didn't manage to register in time, please message a moderator or use the command `!forceregister` if you have admin permissions.  We'll be drawing names on the 14th, so make sure you're in before then!
messages.drawDate: Hey @everyone! It's drawing time :confetti_ball:! Check your DMs for your exchange partner's information, and have a merry christmas :mother_christmas:!
